analyzed: rtag tu shar la phyag 'tshal bstod //

analyzed: rtog med bcom pa rnam bcom med //

original: spang bya med cing gnas pa med //
analyzed: spang bya med cing gnas pa med //

original: rang bzhin med ba snang ba med //
analyzed: rang bzhin med ba snang ba med //

original: the tshom med la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: the tshom med la phyag 'tshal bstod //

original: mchog tu zhi ba phra rags med //
analyzed: mchog tu zhi ba phra rags med //

original: mchog dang bar dang tha ma spangs //
analyzed: mchog dang bar dang tha ma spangs //

original: kun nas ngo bo thams cad bzhugs //
analyzed: kun nas ngo bo thams cad bzhugs //

original: thams cad 'das ma phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: thams cad 'das ma phyag 'tshal bstod //

original: thams cad sems kyi gzugs can ma //
analyzed: thams cad sems kyi gzugs can ma //

original: thams cad mchog tu yongs su ster //
analyzed: thams cad mchog tu yongs su ster //

original: bgegs rnams rab tu zhi ba ma //
analyzed: bgegs rnams rab tu zhi ba ma //

original: bgegs med ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bgegs med ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //

original: tshad med longs spyod med pa la //
analyzed: tshad med longs spyod med pa la //

original: sa 'og sa bla rnam par khyab //
analyzed: sa 'og sa bla rnam par khyab //

original: gnyis med 'chi med lha mo ni //
analyzed: gnyis med 'chi med lha mo ni //

original: mthong ba med la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mthong ba med la phyag 'tshal bstod //

original: sngon nas spangs pa med pa 'dzin //
analyzed: sngon nas spangs pa med pa 'dzin //

original: gnyis su med dus gzi brjid can //
analyzed: gnyis su med dus gzi brjid can //

original: tshad med kun nas rang gi rig / ngo bo med la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: tshad med kun nas rang gi rig / ngo bo med la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the one without essence,

original: grangs med pa yi mi bzad pa //
analyzed: grangs med pa yi mi bzad pa //
translated: The one with immeasurable, unbearable number,

original: shes mig 'jigs pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: shes mig 'jigs pa spangs pa'o //
translated: The one who abandons fear with the eye of knowledge.

original: 'chi ba spangs pa'i dbang phyug mtha' //
analyzed: 'chi ba spangs pa'i dbang phyug mtha' //
translated: The lord of the abandonment of death, the end,

original: dga' ba ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dga' ba ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //

original: bla ma'i drin gyis gdul bya bzhin //
analyzed: bla ma'i drin gyis gdul bya bzhin //

original: rnal 'byor ma mos spyod lam gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma mos spyod lam gyis //
translated: With the conduct of the yoginƒ´s,

original: sems can kun la phan don du //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan don du //
translated: For the benefit of all sentient beings,

original: zhing gi rnal 'byor phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: zhing gi rnal 'byor phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the yoginƒ´s of the field.

original: mos pa chen pos rjes su chags //
analyzed: mos pa chen pos rjes su chags //
translated: With great devotion, I am attached.

original: bstod pas bstod pa'i rkang pa 'di //
analyzed: bstod pas bstod pa'i rkang pa 'di //
translated: These lines of praise

original: sgra dang sgra med shes pa med //
analyzed: sgra dang sgra med shes pa med //
translated: Do not know sound and non-sound.

original: bzod pa mchog gi dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: bzod pa mchog gi dbang phyug ma //

original: bdag ni byis pa rmongs pa ste //
analyzed: bdag ni byis pa rmongs pa ste //
translated: I am a deluded child,

original: mos pas bstod pa shin tu dga' //
analyzed: mos pas bstod pa shin tu dga' //
translated: Delighted by the praise of devotion.

original: zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa 'di blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i pandi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa 'di blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i pandi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This praise of the Goddess of the Field was composed by the very joyful Pandit of the minister caste.

original: // / pandi ta ye shes rdo rje dang / lo ts'a ba nag tsho chen pos bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: // / pandi ta ye shes rdo rje dang / lo ts'a ba nag tsho chen pos bsgyur ba'o //
